Manage Devices Page
Device Options

New Phone
New Device
Authenticating with Different Device
New Phone
New Device
Authenticating with Different Device

In your web browser, navigate to a resource that is protected by Duo- Office.com or Box.
On the Duo authentication prompt, select Other options.

Click on Manage Devices.

You will then be asked to verify your identity before moving forward.
	
Select your preferred authentication method to manage devices.
Select your preferred authentication method to manage devices.

Once logged in, you have a number of options to select in managing your devices.
Clicking Edit on the devices shown will allow you to Delete or Remane.

If you have a new phone, select the I have a new phone link on the box with your current mobile device.

If you have the same phone number with a new mobile device, select Get started and follow the steps needed.

Select Add a device.

You will need to authenticate the new device using your preferred method.
You will need to authenticate the new device using your preferred method.

Follow the steps provided and save your device.

In your web browser, navigate to a resource that is protected by Duo- Office.com or Box.
On the Duo authentication prompt, select Other options.

Select your preferrred authentication method.
	
Your new device will be listed in the "Other options to log in" menu.
Your new device will be listed in the "Other options to log in" menu.
